topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0 Alpha: Enabling and Disabling Networks

body.p: A network is a pluggable, scalable and API-driven system for managing networks and IP addresses. You can enable or disable networks, as needed.

li.p: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Networks link.
The network(s) for the selected project appear.
For the network to enable or disable, click Edit Network.
From the Admin State list, select UP to enable the network.
Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Networks link.
The network(s) for the selected project appear.
For the network to disable, click Edit Network.
From the Admin State list, select DOWN to disable the network.
